ygData.subject: Re: The Val-Shir
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve only been playing EQ for about 6 months, but putting TONS of hours into it. Now that I have a Mid 40 s character, I ve tried twinking the heck out of some
ygData.messageBody:
I've only been playing EQ for about 6 months, but
putting TONS of hours into it. Now that I have a Mid 40's
character, I've tried twinking the heck out of some
characters & I have to admit that it's pretty funny taking
out Yellow mobs in 20 seconds or
less...solo.<br><br>But what I'm really curious to see is the Post-Luclin
twinking that's going to be rampant. I think it will be
like a race to see who can get the first Lvl50 VAH or
BST out there. We are already seeing equipment
including these characters in the race/class
categories.<br><br>As for me you ask? I will definitely be jumping feet
first into one of the new classes. Undoubtedly there
will be some class balancing issues to begin with & it
will be up to me to figure out what the strengths &
weaknesses are before the good stuff get's
nerfed.<br><br>Cya out there
